snippet: When Kansas State meets Texas Christian, there will be no need for fiery speeches, as the players are well aware of what is riding on the outcome: a possible berth in the College Football Playoff.
abstract: Kansas State and Texas Christian University football teams will face off in highly-anticipated showdown that will feature Big 12's two highest-ranked teams; players are all-too-aware that game could mean possible berth in the College Football Playoff.
lead_paragraph: When Kansas State meets Texas Christian, there will be no need for fiery speeches, as the players are well aware of what is riding on the outcome: a possible berth in the College Football Playoff.

headline.main: No Need to Hype Clash Between Kansas State and T.C.U.
headline.print_headline: No Need to Hype This Big 12 Showdown
